    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileLog
    public abstract class BaseRolloverTextLog
extends com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.logging.logs.text.BaseTextLog
    Base class for rollover text logs such as FileLog. Accepts a maximumLogSize(Bytes) and a rollover(Rollover) period and logs messages until either of these limits are reached.
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
